description.value:
This brown leather satchel is made from a heavily oiled and rustic leather. The satchel is large enough to hold up to 1 Bulk worth of items.

Activate 1 minute (envision, Interact)

Effect Documents inside the haversack become magically disguised as documents of a similar type but with misleading information. Anyone inspecting a document notices the disguise with a successful @Check[type:perception|dc:20|name:Determine Documents are Misleading|showDC:all] check, but determining the actual text requires a successful @Check[type:society|dc:20|name:Decipher Writing|traits:action:decipher-writing|showDC:all] check to Decipher Writing. This lasts until you use this activation again, which ends the effect for all previously disguised documents; until you use the second activation to end the effect for a single document; or until a document in the haversack remains outside the haversack for at least 1 hour, ending the effect for that document.

Activate 1 command

Effect You revert one of the documents back to its original state.

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Grand Bazaar
